units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=Jenkins master

[Service]
Type=oneshot
ExecStart=/usr/bin/docker run \
                             --name %p \
                             -p 8080:8080 \
                             -p 50000:50000 \
                             jenkins/jenkins
[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
units.name: jenkins.service

units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=Gerrit master

[Service]
Type=oneshot
ExecStart=/usr/bin/docker run \
                             --name %p \
                             -p 29418:29418 \
                             -p 8081:8080 \
                             -e CANONICAL_WEB_URL=http://localhost \
                             gerritcodereview/gerrit

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
units.name: gerrit.service

units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=Ldap

[Service]
Type=oneshot
ExecStart=/usr/bin/docker run \
                             --name %p \
                             -p 389:389 \
                             -p 636:636 \
                             -e LDAP_ADMIN_PASSWORD=admin \
                             osixia/openldap
[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
units.name: ldap.service

units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=Ldap Admin

[Service]
Type=oneshot
ExecStart=/usr/bin/docker run \
                             --name %p \
                             -p 6443:443 \
                             -e PHPLDAPADMIN_LDAP_HOSTS=ldap \
                             osixia/phpldapadmin

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
units.name: ldap-admin.service
